website_summaries.verdict: The Sony DVP-FX810 may not offer a great picture, but its sleek design, above-average battery life, and affordable price make it an attractive value in the portable DVD category.
pros: The affordable and sleekly designed Sony DVP-FX810 has an 8-inch swivel screen and strong battery life
It also offers dual headphone jacks, an A/V input/output, and MP3/photo CD compatibility
cons: The screen coating causes a noticeable glare, and the picture quality is merely average

customer_reviews.title: Good Player - Will not play VCD's & Other region DVD's
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a long trip to Colorado. This player is solid and the buttons are solid and the do not appear cheap unlike the players from Magnavox, Audiovox etc., Charge appeared to last long enough for about 3 movies or longer though i did not measure it. Included cigarete lighter adapter is a great accessory. One big draw back i found with this player is that it will not play VCD's or DVD's from other countries, though it plays burnt DVD's and burnt CD's/MP3s just fine. It is a great 8" portable dvd player in the market for the price $119+9.95 shipping.
customer_reviews.author: TexasVic

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, Good price
customer_reviews.text: I got my DVD player last week. I got the blue one as it was less expensive by about $20 than the black, red or pink units. The unit is small, has an excellant picture and is fairly lightweight. However, the little speakers are very difficult to hear from. I am using an inexpensive pair of clip-on the ear headphones, and the sound is pretty good. I would recommend this unit to anyone that wants a little quality unit for a very good price
customer_reviews.author: B. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old grandson was able to use this on the airplane with ease. Picture quality and lengh of battery (5 hrs)was just great. Certainly a good value for your money and I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu Artist

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVD player, portable
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, picture quality is great. I agree with other reviews regarding not the best sound quality but it does sound great with a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Best portable dvd player.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this player for the large travels by plane. I used this player in the fly from Seattle,Wa to San Francisco,CA (1.5 hrs), ; I saw one movie with the full battery charge and later for the fly from San Francisco to Mexico City (4.5 hrs) with the rest of charge, I saw 2 movies with the same battery charge, the battery works very well. The only complaint is that the sound is very low, you must listen the player with headphones, I recommend you the Sony MDR-V150, then the sound will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Rockbeat67

customer_reviews.title: Sony
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in perfect condition. It plays for over 6 hours. It is way more convenient than a laptop. We use it for travel, for exercise video's, for just watching a movie outside on the lounge. Great picture as well
customer_reviews.author: DJ - Commercial artist for over 20 yrs

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This portable DVD player offers a crystal clear image, large screen and great placement of controls. Happily, it came with a car charger -- a HUGE plus when taking this on the road to keep a little one entertained! The rotating screen is a great feature when traveling on the plane and we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: It's been just a month or so since I have purchased this DVD Player. But, I must say that I am very well satisfied with it. I must say, however, I had done review of available DVD Players on various web sites. The reviews posted by many other customers have been very helpful in making my decision. I could easily narrow down my search on this one based on the price, customer satisfaction and few other aspects I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad R. Manohar

customer_reviews.title: Sony Portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Thus far the DVD player works great. It has a nice big screen, clear picture & cool blue color that my boys love.
customer_reviews.author: DSL

customer_reviews.title: Smart Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first portable DVD player, so I don't have anything to compare it to. But so far it has met all my expectations -- long battery life, easy for my kids to use in the back seat of the car, and sharp picture.
customer_reviews.author: George Burton

customer_reviews.title: Works well with no problems
customer_reviews.text: We bought the player for a long trip, and it worked very well. We have continued to use it both in the car and at home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Paul

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: shipment was fast and dvd player is perfect for our 2 year old. volume is a little low but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: L. muey

customer_reviews.title: Great product excellent value
customer_reviews.text: We love our sony portable DVD. It is small and light weight and delivers a quality sound and picture. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Klein
